name: create_asset_upload_job
description: Creates an asset upload job and returns its initial status.

name.description: The name of the asset being uploaded.

thumbnail_url.description: URL to the thumbnail image representing the asset.

name: create_autofill_job
description: Creates an asynchronous job to autofill a design from a brand template with input data.

brand_template_id.description: ID of the input brand template.

rows.description: List of rows, where each row contains:

data.description: Dictionary of data fields to autofill. Each key maps to a field object with:

title.description: Optional title for the autofilled design. If not provided, defaults to the template's title.

name: create_comment_reply
description: Adds a reply to a comment thread on a design.

design_id.description: The ID of the design the thread belongs to.

thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to reply to.

message.description: The plaintext message body of the reply. Mentions use [user_id:team_id].

name: create_comment_thread
description: Creates a new comment thread on a design.

design_id.description: The ID of the design to add a comment to.

message.description: The plaintext body of the comment. User mentions must follow the format [user_id:team_id].

assignee_id.description:
Optional ID of the user to assign the comment to.
The user must be mentioned in the comment message.

name: create_design
description: Creates a new design with specified design type, asset, and title.

design_type.description:
The design type to use with the following key:
- "preset": Accepted values for preset are:
- doc
- whiteboard
- presentation
- canvas
- banner
- flyer
- social
- video
- presentation
- infographic
- poster

asset_id.description:
The ID of the asset (e.g., image) to include in the design.
Must be a non-empty string.

title.description: Title of the design. Must be 1–255 characters.

name: create_design_export_job
description: Creates a design export job.

design_id.description: REQUIRED. The ID of the design to export.

format.description: REQUIRED. Dictionary specifying export format options:

quality.description:
SOMETIMES REQUIRED.
    - For JPG: Integer between 1–100 (compression quality).
    - For MP4: One of the following values:
        "horizontal_480p", "horizontal_720p", "horizontal_1080p", "horizontal_4k",
        "vertical_480p", "vertical_720p", "vertical_1080p", "vertical_4k".

size.description: Paper size for PDFs. One of: "a4", "a3", "letter", "legal".

lossless.description: For PNG. If True, export without compression. Default: True.

transparent_background.description: For PNG. If True, enables transparency. Default: False.

as_single_image.description: If True, export multipage design as a single image. Default: False.

name: create_design_import_job
description: Creates a design import job from a file upload.

import_metadata.description: Metadata included in the Import-Metadata header:

title_base64.description: REQUIRED. Base64-encoded design title (max 50 unencoded characters).

name: create_folder
description: Creates a new folder with the given name under the specified parent folder.

name.description: Name of the new folder (1–255 characters).

parent_folder_id.description: ID of the parent folder (1–50 characters).

name: create_url_design_import_job
description: Creates a design import job using a public URL.

title.description: REQUIRED. The title for the imported design (1–255 characters).

url.description: REQUIRED. Publicly accessible file URL (1–2048 characters).

mime_type.description: MIME type of the file (1–100 characters). If not provided, it will be auto-detected.

name: delete_asset
description: Deletes an asset by its ID.

asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to delete.

name: delete_folder
description: Deletes a folder and all its contents recursively.

folder_id.description: ID of the folder to delete.

name: get_asset
description: Retrieves metadata for a specific asset by its ID.

asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to retrieve.

name: get_asset_upload_job
description: Retrieves the status and result of an asset upload job.

job_id.description: The ID of the asset upload job.

name: get_autofill_job
description: Retrieves the status and results of an autofill job by its ID.

job_id.description: The ID of the autofill job to retrieve.

name: get_brand_template
description: Retrieve a brand template by its ID.

brand_template_id.description: The ID of the brand template.

name: get_brand_template_dataset
description:
Gets the dataset definition of a brand template. If the brand template contains autofill data fields,

this returns an object with the data field names and the type of data they accept.

name: get_comment_reply
description: Retrieves a specific reply from a thread on a design.

thread_id.description: The ID of the thread the reply belongs to.

reply_id.description: The ID of the reply to retrieve.

name: get_comment_thread
description: Retrieves a specific comment thread from a design.

thread_id.description: The ID of the thread to retrieve.

name: get_current_user
description: Retrieves the team-related user information for the given user ID.

name: get_current_user_profile
description: Retrieves the profile data for the given user ID.

name: get_design
description: Retrieves metadata for a single design.

design_id.description: The ID of the design. Must be a non-empty string.

name: get_design_export_job
description: Retrieves the status and results of a design export job.

name: get_design_import_job
description: Retrieves the status and result of a design import job.

job_id.description: The ID of the design import job.

name: get_design_pages
description: Retrieves pages from a design, with support for pagination.

design_id.description: The ID of the design to retrieve pages from.

offset.description:
The index of the first page to return (1-based). Default is 1.
Min: 1, Max: 500.

limit.description:
The number of pages to return. Default is 50.
Min: 1, Max: 200.

name: get_folder
description: Retrieves metadata for a specific folder.

folder_id.description: ID of the folder to retrieve.

name: get_url_design_import_job
description: Retrieves the status and result of a URL import job.

job_id.description: The ID of the URL import job.

name: list_brand_templates
description: List brand templates with optional filters and sorting.

query.description: Search term to filter brand templates by title.

name: list_comment_replies
description: Lists replies from a specific thread on a design.

limit.description: Max number of replies to return (default: 50, min: 1, max: 100).

name: list_designs
description: Lists user-owned and shared designs, optionally filtered and sorted.

query.description: Search term to filter designs by title (max length: 255).

ownership.description:
Filter by ownership - "any", "owned", or "shared".
Defaults to "any".

name: list_folder_items
description: Lists items (folders, designs, images) within a specified folder.

folder_id.description: The ID of the folder to list items from.

item_types.description:
Comma-delimited list of item types to filter by.
Valid values: "folder", "design", "image".

sort_by.description:
Field used to sort the results.
Valid values:
- "created_ascending"
- "created_descending"
- "modified_ascending"
- "modified_descending" (default)
- "title_ascending"
- "title_descending"

name: update_asset
description: Updates the metadata of an existing asset and returns the updated asset.

asset_id.description: The ID of the asset to update.

name.description: New name for the asset (max 50 characters).

tags.description: New list of tags for the asset (max 50 tags).

name: update_folder
description: Updates the name of a folder and its modification timestamp.

folder_id.description: ID of the folder to update.

name.description: New name for the folder (1–255 characters).
